net.viktorc.detroid.framework.engine

Class Evaluator

  • Object
    • Evaluator

  • public class Evaluator
extends Object
    A class for evaluating chess positions. It uses an evaluation hash table to improve performance. It also offers a static exchange evaluation function.
    Author:
    Viktor

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Evaluator(DetroidParameters params, Cache<ETEntry> evalTable)
      Initializes a chess position evaluator.

      A static evaluation of the chess position from the color to move's point of view.
      short SEE(Position pos, Move move)
      A static exchange evaluation algorithm for determining a close approximation of a capture's value.

    • Method Detail

      • isMaterialInsufficient

        public static boolean isMaterialInsufficient(Position pos)
        Returns whether the position is a case of insufficient material.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position to test.
        Returns:
        Whether there is sufficient material on board to mate.

      • MVVLVA

        public static short MVVLVA(Move move)
        Returns the MVV/LVA score of the specified move.
        Parameters:
        move - The move to score.
        Returns:
        The MVV/LVA score of the move.

      • SEE

        public short SEE(Position pos,
                 Move move)
        A static exchange evaluation algorithm for determining a close approximation of a capture's value.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position in which the move is to be evaluated.
        move - The move to score.
        Returns:
        The SEE score of the move.

      • score

        public short score(Position pos,
                   byte hashGen,
                   ETEntry entry,
                   Map<String,Double> gradientCache)
        A static evaluation of the chess position from the color to move's point of view. It considers material imbalance, coverage, pawn structure, queen-king tropism, mobility, immediate captures, etc. It assumes that the position is not a check.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position to score.
        hashGen - The hash generation.
        entry - The pre-constructed evaluation table entry.
        gradientCache - An optional map for storing the gradient of the evaluation function w.r.t. the parameters used.
        Returns:
        The score of the position.

      • score

        public short score(Position pos,
                   byte hashGen,
                   ETEntry entry)
        A static evaluation of the chess position from the color to move's point of view. It considers material imbalance, coverage, pawn structure, queen-king tropism, mobility, immediate captures, etc. It assumes that the position is not a check.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position to score.
        hashGen - The hash generation.
        entry - The pre-constructed evaluation table entry.
        Returns:
        The score of the position.
